definition: Pavlov (name)/Ivan Petrovich Pavlov (1849-1936), Russian experimental psychologist
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Pavlov's theory had an extensive and profound influence on study of psychology.
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫學說對心理科學研究的影響廣泛而深刻。

sentences.english: Pavlov created the higher nervous activity brain theory 80 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫創立了大腦高級神經活動學說。

sentences.english: Pavlov, when he started this research, had no interest at all in learning.
sentences.chinese: 在研究的最初，巴甫洛夫，對學習行爲毫無興趣。

sentences.english: Pavlov had no time for alternative explanations for sleep.
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫沒有機會對睡眠做出其他的解釋。

sentences.english: It works just like Pavlov and salivation .
sentences.chinese: 它就像巴甫洛夫的口水實驗。

sentences.english: We guarantee the whole crowd will be singing along in Pavlovian unison by the end of the first verse.
sentences.chinese: 我們保證整個人羣會唱歌的巴甫洛夫一齊到年底首詩。

sentences.english: This method is called “Pavlov’s method of chasing after girls”.
sentences.chinese: 這是第一種，叫“巴甫洛夫泡妞法”。

sentences.english: Pavlov discovered that when dogs were fed meat powder they salivated .
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫發現當餵狗喫肉末的時候它們就留口水。

sentences.english: It was thought up by Pavlov.
sentences.chinese: 經典條件作用是巴甫洛夫提出的。

sentences.english: I had become a Pavlovian parachutist.
sentences.chinese: 我變成了一個巴甫洛夫式的跳傘者。

sentences.english: Even you don't know Pavlov's dog!
sentences.chinese: 你甚至不知道巴甫洛夫的條件反射學嗎？

sentences.english: Pavlovian reaction conditions of the study belongs to such an act.
sentences.chinese: 巴甫洛夫研究的條件反應就屬於這種行爲。

definition: Vladimir Ilyich Lenin (1870-1924), Russian revolutionary leader
Floyd (name)/Freud (name)/Dr Sigmund Freud (1856-1939), the founder of psychoanalysis
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev (1834-1907), Russian chemist who introduced the periodic table

pinyin: Che1 er3 ni2 xue3 fu1 si1 ji1

definition: variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
Lorentz (name)/Hendrik Lorentz (1853-1928), Dutch physicist, 1902 Nobel laureate
